name: api-spec
description: STAC API helpers to generate, serve and check the API spec.

scripts.generate-all: npm run generate-core && npm run generate-ext
scripts.serve-ext: npm run generate-all && redoc-cli serve STAC-extensions.yaml --watch --options.expandResponses "200,201,202,203,204" --options.pathInMiddlePanel true
scripts.serve: npm run generate-all && redoc-cli serve STAC.yaml --watch --options.expandResponses "200,201,202,203,204" --options.pathInMiddlePanel true
scripts.check: npm run check-markdown && npm run check-openapi
scripts.check-openapi: npm run generate-all && spectral lint STAC.yaml && spectral lint STAC-extensions.yaml
